column1: Contour was empty hence was drawn again
Contour was overlapping other structures hence needed to be edited
Contour was irregular in outline and needed to be smoothened
Disconnected segments (blobs) were present which needed to be joined
Segments of contour were present in other structures which were removed
Contour did not cover the entire structure properly hence edited
Contour was drawn on the incorrect side (completely) hence corrected or redrawn
Contour was drawn on the incorrect side (partially) hence corrected or redrawn
Segments of contour were present outside the body structure which were removed
Contour was located at the wrong region or site or structure hence corrected or redrawn
There were holes inside the contour which had to be filled
